text: Niklaus at the 2007 World Championships in Athletics. André Niklaus (born 30 August 1981 in Berlin) is a German decathlete. ==Achievements== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |1999 |European Junior Championships |Riga, Latvia |align="center" | 4th |Decathlon |7339 pts PB |- |2000 |World Junior Championships |Santiago, Chile |bgcolor="cc9966" align="center" | 3rd |Decathlon |7712 pts PB |- |rowspan=2|2001 |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |12th |Decathlon |7891 pts PB |- |European U23 Championships |Amsterdam, Netherlands |bgcolor=gold|1st |Decathlon |8042 pts |- |rowspan=2|2003 |European U23 Championships |Bydgoszcz, Poland |bgcolor=gold|1st |Decathlon |7983 pts |- |World Championships |Paris, France |align="center" | 8th |Decathlon |8020 pts PB |- |2004 |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |13th |Decathlon |7929 pts |- |rowspan=2|2005 |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |7th |Decathlon |8074 pts PB |- |World Championships |Helsinki, Finland |align="center" | 4th |Decathlon |8316 pts PB |- |rowspan=2|2006 |World Indoor Championships |Moscow, Russia |bgcolor="gold" align="center" | 1st |Heptathlon |6192 pts iPBIAAF indoor profile for André Niklaus' profile at the IAAF site |- |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |4th |Decathlon |8239 pts PB |- |2007 |Hypo- Meeting |Götzis, Austria |5th |Decathlon |8340 pts PB |- |2008 |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria | — |Decathlon |DNF |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:German decathletes Category:Sportspeople from Berlin Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of Germany Category:World Athletics Indoor Championships winners
